title: Calgary: February Meeting
content:
Now that we've forsaken the Kensington Pub, we seem to be jumping all over da place.

Our next meeting is tomorrow, Wednesday, Feb. 20, 2008. It'll be held upstairs at Jupiter, 124 - 10th Street N.W. (Jupiter is just behind The Source, go around the corner and up the stairs; alternately, Jupiter is just past Saturn if you have the proper impulse engines.)

Show up around 6:00 p.m. There's a good chance the Typos will be the largest group in the joint. We can be identified by (1) being at Jupiter, (2) drinking beer and talking, (3) possibly passing books, pamphlets, specimens & whatnot amongst ourselves. Don't be shy, show up and say hi. Bring stuff typographic for show&tell and to keep the enthusiasm going.
author: KenBessie

comments.content: Bring your cameras too, as we'll take a break around 7 p.m. to take a boo at the lunar eclipse. ;-)
